name: Livedocs
headline: No-code analytics tool for modern teams
description: Livedocs is a no-code analytics tool for modern teams. We are building a document editor that helps non-technical operators build reports with live data from tools like Stripe, Google Analytics, Segment without writing code.

founders.name: Arsalan Bashir, Founder
founders.description: Founder of Livedocs (https://livedocs.com), engineer, love software, guerilla marketing (for the web), hiking, and Liverpool FC.

# A New Kind of Notebook for Data Storytelling
Mix Python, SQL, charts, and dynamic text in a fast, shareable, collaborative medium. Build and share data-rich docs your team will love
[Start building for free](https://livedocs.com/</start>)[Schedule a demo](https://livedocs.com/<https:/cal.com/arsln/livedocs-demo>)
Free forever—no credit card required.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/671f91923bedd55c1b07ff52_Report%20for%20Hero%20Banner.png)
Watch demo (2 min)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/img/placeholder-thumb.svg)](https://livedocs.com/<#>)
Join a community of innovators

## Explore data, uncover narratives
From complex queries and transforms to presentation-ready results
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66ffb6e7fcec76820b5466d6_Beautiful.avif)
Beautiful
Dive into a seamless interface that makes data exploration a joy
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66ffb730f5376209460e6e51_Collaborative.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66e82df845c26c4a8e654a44_UI.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66e82dfd97adcd17e316fd8d_UI-1.avif)
Collaborative
Real-time collaboration and sharing to bring your team together
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66ffabed5583195633b66a34_Powerful.avif)
Powerful
Everything you need for data exploration, all in one place
## Wall of Love
Browse and learn from templates shared by our vibrant community
So pretty, you’ll fall in love️
[Pick a template](https://livedocs.com/<#>)
OR
[Create from scratch](https://livedocs.com/</start>)

## Drag, drop, data app
Livedocs’s app builder and complete set of components makesit easy to build interactive experiences.
## Where the magic happens
Livedocs helps you wrangle data, uncover insights, and dazzle your team. Here's a peek at the ingredients that make Livedocs the recipe for success
Jedi (Beta)
Jedi AI assists you every step of the way to gain the insights you need
Powerful Charts
Bring Python, SQL, Charts, no-code, spreadsheets together
Embeds
Enhance your productivity by using your favorite languages and IDE tools
Connect your data
Connects to your dbs, files, APIs, spreadsheets, etc
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66e8541ef42d06efa20f0420_Slack-1.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66e8541d560010722a802182_Slack-4.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66e8541d1fb374224b251587_Slack-3.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66e8541d291ee79fda4064c8_Slack-2.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e65ecc0dcb8cb0f10d694b/66e8541d4f7a131e763f4f74_Slack.avif)
Built for speed
Performance Powered by DuckDB and Polars

Livedocs’s app builder and complete set of components makesit easy to build interactive experiences.
## Where the magic happens

Jedi (Beta)
Jedi AI assists you every step of the way to gain the insights you need
Powerful Charts
Bring Python, SQL, Charts, no-code, spreadsheets together
Embeds
Enhance your productivity by using your favorite languages and IDE tools
Connect your data

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Livedocs**

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator’s W22 batch, Livedocs is redefining how modern teams manage data with its no-code analytics tool. Based in San Francisco, the company operates with a small team of three and aims to empower non-technical users to craft insightful reports from live data without the need for coding. 

**Mission:**  
Livedocs is on a quest to democratize data analytics—bridging the gap between complexity and accessibility—by enabling users to seamlessly integrate, visualize, and share data insights across popular platforms like Stripe, Google Analytics, and Segment.

**Core Product:**  
Livedocs offers a document editor that functions as a dynamic notebook for data storytelling. Users can mix Python, SQL, charts, and text in a collaborative environment. The platform supports real-time collaboration, allowing teams to explore and present data effectively without prior coding experience. The software emphasizes raw simplicity—start building for free, no credit card required.

**Key Features:**
- **Intuitive Interface:** An easy-to-navigate platform that makes data exploration enjoyable.
- **Powerful Charts and Embeds:** Bring together various data tools and presents the insights with beautiful visualizations.
- **Jedi AI (Beta):** Assists users by generating insights while navigating data challenges.
- **Community and Resources:** Engages users through a rich ecosystem of templates, community-shared ideas, and resources such as the Smooth Operators Guide podcast.

**Website and Resources:**  
To dive deeper into what Livedocs offers, visit their [website](https://livedocs.com), read their [blog](https://livedocs.com/<https:/livedocs.com/blog>), or explore their documentation and community guides. 

In a world where data is both a blessing and a cloud of confusion, Livedocs sheds light, making it easy for any modern team to become data-driven storytellers. Time to get your data superpowers!
